attributes.action: Call for Priti Patel's and Rishi Sunak's resignation as they are unfit.
attributes.additional_details: Rishi Sunak is making people of this country pay for his mistakes by raising taxes. Priti Patel latest imigration law for people to come into the UK is ridicolous
attributes.background: Demand a parliment Debate wether Rishi Sunak and Priti Patel are fit be part of the goverment after their failings and losses of goverment funds and failed immigration laws.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
